attributes.additional_details: Get vet's to give the animals and owners fair prices
attributes.background: Regulate vet's on price's for medication, I've been informed by my vet that my cat is diabetic and 1 little bottle of 2.5ml cost me £65.50p. I've found i can get a year's supply cheaper then the one i got. It's not fair and alot of people don't know about the website to get cheaper prices

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting veterinary fees or prices for animal medication.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a Veterinary Services Ombudsman: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584395

Create a free Animal Health Service for pets please: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142
